Data: Toss and teams: Australia have won the toss and they will bat first. They have made two changes - Nathan Bracken and Stuart Clark go out. The two Bens - Hilfenhaus and Laughlin - come in.
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run drops the loosener short outside off and he helps himself to an upper cut to third man
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run hits a good length on the offstump and he pats it away, Shoaib is ambling in - not at full throttle yet
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run lands it outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run pushes it softly to mid-on
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, FOUR runs too wide outside off and enough width for him to free his arms, get his front foot forward and bisect the gap between cover and point
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run holds the length back and keeps the ball outside off, he safely shoulders arms
Umar Gul to Watson, no run he overpitches outside off but gets away with it as Watson pushes it hard straight to short mid-off
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run shortish outside off and a risky shot as he slashes it in the air down the vacant gully position
Umar Gul to Haddin, 1 run punched down to the right of mid-off and the fielder does really well to slide and cut it off, good commitment
Umar Gul to Watson, no run induces the false shot! He prods forward and the ball kicks up a bit off a good length and goes through straight, very close to th edge
Umar Gul to Watson, no run clips it with the angle towards short square leg and there's hesitation but the batsmen stay put
Umar Gul to Watson, no run gets across on the backfoot and defends with a dead bat
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, FOUR runs he gifts him a half volley on the pads and Haddin turns the face of the bat and whips it wide of midwicket, the ball slows down before reaching the rope
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 2 runs strays on the pads again and he clips it with the angle to fine leg
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 1 run delivers from slightly wide of the crease, the batsman taps it towards short mid-on with soft hands and sets off quickly
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run the first bit of action for the day, Shoaib drops it short and has Watson fending, Shoaib had something to say to him and Watson returned the pleasantries
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run drops it short and he fends it to the off side and they take a single
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run angles it in towards middle and leg and he tucks it to midwicket
Umar Gul to Watson, no run Umar Gul bowls a jaffa outside off, he's getting the ball to kick up alarmingly, that was mighty close to that outside edge
Umar Gul to Watson, no run gets a half stride forward and defends with soft hands
Umar Gul to Watson, no run he prods forward and hangs his bat out but plays with very soft hands, the edge drops well short of Misbah at first slip
Umar Gul to Watson, 2 runs chance! Watson swivels and fails to time his pull, the ball travels off the top edge of the bat but drops behind square leg, two fielders chase it
Umar Gul to Watson, no run outside off, he moves across and defends on the backfoot
Umar Gul to Watson, no run gets across and defends a good length ball on the front foot
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 1 wide that's a poor delivery, really wide outside the leg stump and Akmal has an early workout
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 1 run slower ball but he picks it early, opens the face of the bat and steers it wide of second slip
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run slower ball, he gets forward and drops it to the on side
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run shuffles and clips it to the on side
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run keeps it on the offstump and he gets forward and defends
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, FOUR runs gives him width and Haddin gets forward and thumps it hard at the gap between mid-off and cover, the bat speed was tremendous and the ball just sped away
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run gets across and defends to the off side
Umar Gul to Watson, FOUR runs rare bad delivery from Gul, he strays on the pads and Watson clips it slightly in the air but bisects the gap between square leg and midwicket, safe shot in the end

Umar Gul to Watson, SIX runs that was worth driving miles to see! Gul pitches it up and it's a forward defensive scoop which sends it over wide long-off, excellent timing and a really good follow through
Umar Gul to Watson, no run gets behind the line and defends
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run drops it short and he goes for the pull and places it to fine leg, the fielder is more towards long leg
Umar Gul to Haddin, 1 run short again and he works it away down to fine leg again
Umar Gul to Watson, 2 runs slower ball and he clips it towards midwicket and the fielder doesn't time his dive well, he palms it to the deep
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run slower ball and he taps it to mid-on
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run false shot by Haddin as he swats one from outside off and nearly chips it on the full to mid-on who's up close
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run gets beside the line and steers it down to backward point
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run slower ball and he nearly clips it on the full to short fine leg, nice field placing by Younis
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run cranks up the pace and drops it a bit short, Haddin knocks it to cover and thinks of a single but watson isn't interested
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run keeps it on a good length and he steers it to cover point
Arafat to Watson, 1 run loosener outside the offstump and he opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man

Arafat to Haddin, FOUR runs Haddin's in imperious touch, he stays at the crease and chips him high over midwicket, he times it well and the follow through is sound, looked like he played it in his sleep
Arafat to Haddin, no run gets behind the line and pushes it down the track
Arafat to Haddin, no run shuffles and tries to work it round the corner but the ball clips his body and rolls away

Arafat to Haddin, FOUR runs lazy elegance from Haddin again, Arafat drops it short of a length and the ball sits up nicely for Haddin to thump it in the air past the bowler and wide of mid-on, he just stayed at the crease and played the shot
Arafat to Haddin, FOUR runs bowls it too full and he whips it with the angle wide of midwicket, poor over from Arafat
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run opens the face of the bat to a slower ball and dabs it to third man
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run another slower ball and the batsman gets behind and defends with a dead bat
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, FOUR runs he's seeing it like a football! Shoaib drops it short outside off and it's suicidal on this pitch, Haddin swivels and biffs it wide of short midwicket
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 2 runs shuffles across and clips it with the angle down to deep square leg

Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, OUT Sharp catch by the captain! Haddin makes room to a full ball and tries to scoop it over mid-off, the ball makes contact with the bottom half of the bat and travels quickly to Younis at short mid-off who leaps and takes the catch over his head
Shoaib Akhtar to North, no run gets right across his stumps and defends firmly to mid-off
Arafat to Watson, no run shuffles and works it to the on side
Arafat to Watson, no run defends with soft hands and the ball bounces off the pitch and nearly lands on top of the stumps
Arafat to Watson, 2 runs shuffle and works it with the angle to the on side

Arafat to Watson, FOUR runs looked like a mid-hit at first but the ball was well clear of any fielder, he swings a tad early and the ball swirls in the air for a long while before dropping just short of the rope at deep midwicket
Arafat to Watson, no run gets across and defends with a half prod forward
Arafat to Watson, (no ball) he oversteps, Watson mistimes the pull to Afridi at midwicket
Arafat to Watson, SIX runs Free Hit: It's a friendly half volley on middle and leg and he stays at the crease and lofts through the line and clears the rope at long-on
Ajmal to North, no run starts off with the regulation offspinner, North defends
Ajmal to North, no run moves across his stumps early and he clips the doosra to short square leg
Ajmal to North, no run flighted outside off and defended to the off side
Ajmal to North, 1 run flighted across the left hander and he shuffles and works it wide of square leg
Ajmal to Watson, no run shuffles and clips it to the leg side but fails to clear midwicket
Ajmal to Watson, no run the top spinner, he gets behind and defends
Afridi to North, 1 run flighted on middle and off and he gets forward and clips it wide of mid-on
Afridi to Watson, no run loops it into the right hander and Watson drives on the up to mid-off
Afridi to Watson, no run doesn't quite cover the line and he gets a leading edge to the off side
Afridi to Watson, no run stays on the backfoot and defends back to the bowler
Afridi to Watson, no run offers the full face of the bat and pushes it to mid-off
Afridi to Watson, no run gets behind the line and defends to the off side
Ajmal to North, 1 run gets forward early and pushes it towards mid-off and takes the single
Ajmal to Watson, FOUR runs drops it short and it's an invitation for Watson as he waits for it to turn in, he pulls and places it wide of fine leg who's fielding very square
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run gets behind the line and defends
Ajmal to North, no run
Ajmal to North, no run gets behind the line and defends
Ajmal to North, no run gets a half prod forward and defends down the track
Afridi to Watson, no run lunges forward and pushes a full delivery to mid-off
Afridi to Watson, no run flighted on middle and leg and he defends
Afridi to Watson, 1 run slower through the air and he gets forward and clips it just wide of square leg and sets off for a quick single
Afridi to North, no run this one comes on straight and he gets forward and steers it to the off side
Afridi to North, 1 run quicker delivery and North clips it wide of mid-on, deep midwicket runs across and cuts it off
Afridi to Watson, no run full outside off and pushed firmly to mid-off
Ajmal to North, 1 run slow through the air and he shuffles and drills it to short fine leg
Ajmal to Watson, no run moves across and clips it with the turn to the on side
Ajmal to Watson, no run commits to the front foot and smothers the spin
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run gets on his knee and sweeps him firmly to fine leg
Ajmal to North, no run the doosra, he shapes to drive and gets an inside edge onto his boot

Ajmal to North, OUT beaten in flight! North chips down the track on seeing the extra flight but Ajmal cleverly gets it to go through straight and foxes him, Akmal effects an easy stumping. North was probably expecting it to turn away. Ajmal set it up the previous ball by bowlin
Afridi to Watson, no run full outside off and he gets well forward and defends
Afridi to Watson, no run slower through the air and he lunges forward and smothers the spin
Afridi to Watson, 1 run full on middle and off and pushed back to the bowler
Afridi to Clarke, no run tosses it up and bowls it straight, Clarke defends on the front foot again
Afridi to Clarke, no run quicker through the air and Clarke commits forward early and defends
Afridi to Clarke, 2 runs slower through the air and Clarke gets a thin outside edge which beats slip, gully runs backward and cuts it off
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run gets across his stumps and pushes it just wide of the diving Ajmal, easy single to long-on
Ajmal to Clarke, no run slow through the air and he works it straight to short square-leg
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run gives it more flight and he chips down the track and pushes it to long-on
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run works it through the gap between midwicket and square leg
Ajmal to Clarke, no run quicker, he clips it straight to midwicket
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run drops it short and he swivels and swats it along the turf to deep square-leg
Afridi to Clarke, 3 runs short and slightly wide outside off and he rocks back and slams it past the covers, malik pulls it back before the rope
Afridi to Watson, 1 run punches it in front of mid-on and sets off for a quick single
Afridi to Clarke, no run tosses it up outside off and he watchfully shoulders arms
Afridi to Clarke, no run quicker through the air and he defends with a dead bat
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run he bowls the indrifter, he pushes it through the line to mid-on
Afridi to Watson, no run drops this one short and he gets ready to pull but ends up chopping it to the on side
Ajmal to Clarke, no run turns it to short square leg and the non striker tells him to stay back
Ajmal to Clarke, no run gets right across his stumps and defends with a dead bat

Ajmal to Clarke, FOUR runs chance! Ajmal gets it to turn inwards and the ball kicks up a bit too, Clarke is caught unawares and gets a thick outside edge which beats Afirdi at slip, Afridi made the mistake of moving to his right when he should have moved the other way
Ajmal to Clarke, no run pushed down the pitch
Ajmal to Clarke, no run comes down and pushes it back to the bowler
Ajmal to Clarke, no run
Afridi to Watson, 2 runs pulls it to deep square leg and the fielder fumbles
Afridi to Watson, no run gets forward and defends
Afridi to Watson, 1 run gets across his stumps and gets a leading edge to the off side
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run rocks on the backfoot and cuts wide of point
Afridi to Watson, no run drops it short and he pulls hard but Younis is alert at midwicket
Afridi to Watson, 1 run full outside off and pushed to the off side
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, he shuffles and clips it to the on side
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run rocks back and punches it to cover and sets off
Ajmal to Watson, no run quicker through the air and defended to the offside
Ajmal to Watson, no run shuffles and nudges him softly towards short fine leg
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run pushes it in front of mid-on and sets off very quickly
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run bowls it much quicker and he clips it on the full to midwicket
Afridi to Clarke, no run chips down the track and pads it away, Afridi does well to drop it short and keep him quiet
Afridi to Clarke, no run gets well forward and defends to the off side, very close to the pads and Bowden shakes his head
Afridi to Clarke, no run gives it a lot of air, he lunges forward and defends
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run full outside off and pushed wide of point
Afridi to Watson, FOUR runs dropped it short on the offstump, Watson picked it early and deposited it over midwicket
Afridi to Watson, no run gets forward to defend and he gets a leading edge which rolls towards mid-off
Malik to Clarke, 2 runs starts off with a loosener, he rocks back and cuts to sweeper cover
Malik to Clarke, 1 run chips down the track and pushes a full delivery to long-off
Malik to Watson, no run no turn off the pitch, he defends on the front foot
Malik to Watson, 1 run angles it into the right hander and he clips it away wide of square leg
Malik to Clarke, no run comes down the pitch and he checks his shot and defends back to the bowler
Malik to Clarke, no run pushed in on middle and leg and he clips it to square leg
Afridi to Watson, no run flighted on middle and leg and he clips it to the on side
Afridi to Watson, 1 run yet another indrifter, he shuffles and works it on its way to the on side
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run uses his feet and pushes it through the line to long-off
Afridi to Watson, no run gets his leg forward and the ball lobs off his pads to the on side
Afridi to Watson, no run drifts it in and then gets it to turn away, Watson watches the spin and defends
Afridi to Watson, 1 run drops it fractionally short and he rocks back and cuts to sweeper cover
Malik to Watson, FOUR runs drops it quite short and he seizes on it early and pulls past mid-on, Misbah was fielding in that position and he didn't see it at all
Malik to Watson, no run
Malik to Watson, 2 runs gets across and works it with the turn to fine leg
Malik to Watson, no run flighted on middle and leg and he defends
Malik to Watson, 1 run slow through the air and he pushes it with the turn to long-on
Malik to Clarke, no run slow through the air, he waits for it before softly pushing it towards mid-off
Umar Gul to Watson, no run drops it fractionally short and Watson goes for a cross-batted swipe and gets a thick inside edge
Umar Gul to Watson, no run much better, he gets right behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run short and wide outside off, he slams it square of the wicket on the off side
Umar Gul to Clarke, no run keeps it nice and straight and Clarke defends off the full face of the bat
Umar Gul to Clarke, no run similar line and length, a restrictive line, another defensive shot back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Clarke, no run punches it straight to cover and tells his partner to wait
Malik to Watson, 1 run pushes it towards midwicket, the fielder ought to have saved that
Malik to Clarke, 1 run full and pushed down the ground to long-off
Malik to Watson, 1 run clipped to short fine leg and they jog the single
Malik to Clarke, no run chips down the pitch and pushes it straight back to the bowler
Malik to Clarke, 1 run down the leg side and nudged wide of square leg
Malik to Watson, no run gets across his stumps and decides to defend with a dead bat back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Clarke, no run stands tall and punches it straight towards mid-off

Umar Gul to Clarke, 1 run Excellent delivery! That's a fast reverse swinging yorker which jams his toe in line with the leg stump, the ball rolls to the off side and Bowden has given it as runs, there was no bat involved I'm afraid that should have been given out, at least acco
Umar Gul to Watson, no run defended on the front foot to the on side
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run comes down the track and pushes it to long-on
Umar Gul to Clarke, 1 run defended off the backfoot to cover for a single
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run pushes a low full toss straight to long-on for a single
Malik to Watson, no run tries to nudge it to the on side but the ball rolls off the pads
Malik to Watson, 1 run angles it across the right hander and he clips it to the on side
Malik to Clarke, 1 run very very sloppy! Misbah picks it up at midwicket and blindly flicks it to the bowler's end, the only problem was that he missed the bowler and the stumps by about 5 miles
Malik to Watson, 1 run pushed wide of midwicket
Malik to Clarke, no run
Malik to Clarke, 1 run gets forward and defends back to the bowler

Umar Gul to Clarke, OUT Gul finally gets a reward, he lands it on a good length on the corridor outside the offstump and Clarke gets a very thin leading edge as he shapes to clip it to the on side, Gul beat the bat on a few occasions in his first spell so it was a matter of tim
Umar Gul to Symonds, no run gets reverse swing and Symonds pushes it back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Symonds, no run full and swinging in again and he pushes it to mid-on
Umar Gul to Symonds, 2 runs angles it on the pads and he works it away behind square on the on side
Umar Gul to Symonds, no run shapes to punch but gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
Umar Gul to Symonds, no run keeps it just outside off and Symonds opts to shoulder arms, he watches it move inwards before reaching the keeper
Malik to Watson, no run gets it to turn in and he defends
Malik to Watson, 1 run this one skids through and turns and Watson just manages to get some bat on it, the edge rolls to gully
Malik to Symonds, no run full on middle and off and he clips it to mid-on
Malik to Symonds, no run gets across and pushes it to the off side
Malik to Symonds, no run gets forward and pushes it to the bowler's leg
Malik to Symonds, 1 run punches it to long-on and jogs the single
Arafat to Symonds, no run starts off his new spell with a short delivery and the batsman stands tall and fends it off
Arafat to Symonds, no run gets across and pushes it down the pitch
Arafat to Symonds, 1 run angles it into the right hander and he clips it behind square on the on side
Arafat to Watson, 1 run rocks on the backfoot and pulls it to deep backward square-leg
Arafat to Symonds, no run full outside off and pushes it straight to extra cover
Arafat to Symonds, no run the slower one this time and Symonds checks his shot as he comes forward, cover picks it up
Malik to Watson, 1 run full outside off and he comes down the pitch and pushes it to long-on
Malik to Symonds, 3 runs shuffles it and glances to fine leg, Arafat was a little lazy in the chase but somehow managed to pull it back just inches before the rope
Malik to Watson, no run
Malik to Watson, no run sharp turn and he defends back to the bowler
Malik to Watson, 1 run works it across the line and places it to deep midwicket
Malik to Symonds, no run clips it straight to Misbah at midwicket
Arafat to Watson, 1 run punched off the backfoot
Arafat to Symonds, 1 run punches it to the left of mid-off and Watson was a little slow off the blocks, luckily the throw is wide
Arafat to Watson, no run plays it to the on side
Arafat to Watson, no run
Arafat to Watson, 1 run gets on the front foot and punches it to sweeper cover
Arafat to Symonds, 1 run drops it short and he shuffles and tucks it to deep square leg
Malik to Symonds, no run defended off the backfoot
Malik to Symonds, 1 wide tries to paddle it past the keeper but it was too wide
Malik to Symonds, 1 run punched wide of the diving extra cover fielder
Malik to Watson, 1 run the doosra, he picks it early, rocks back and cuts to the off side
Malik to Symonds, 1 run shuffles and nudges it to square leg, Symonds has to scamper back to his crease and the throw to Malik is quick and wide, he hurts his finger as he tries to gather the ball
Malik to Watson, no run stays back and taps it to the off side
Malik to Watson, 1 run shuffles and clips it with the turn to fine leg
Afridi to Watson, no run he gets to the pitch and punches it hard to mid-off
Afridi to Watson, no run makes room and cuts hard and finds Shehzad at point
Afridi to Watson, no run gets right behind the line to a quick delivery and defends
Afridi to Watson, no run fires in a quick googly and Watson can only defend it
Afridi to Watson, 1 run after four scoreless deliveries he pulls hard with intent but mistimes it to long-on
Afridi to Symonds, FOUR runs he tosses it up and Symonds accepts the invite by getting forward and lofting well wide of mid-off's right, welcome boundary
Malik to Watson, 1 run kneels down for a premeditated sweep and he places it to deep square leg
Malik to Symonds, no run checks his shot and the leading edge lobs towards short cover
Malik to Symonds, OUT tossed up outside off, it's a conventional offspinner and Symonds is a little lazy on the cut and he ends up chopping it onto the base of the offstump
Malik to Ferguson, no run flighted on middle and leg and he clips it to the on side
Malik to Ferguson, 1 run full on the pads and pushed towards mid-on
Malik to Watson, 2 runs flighted on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and sweeps just wide of fine leg
Afridi to Ferguson, 1 run full outside off and pushed towards mid-off
Afridi to Watson, no run drops it short and he gets away with it as Watson makes room and slaps it straight to cover
Afridi to Watson, 1 leg bye flighted on middle and leg, he clips it to the on side

Afridi to Ferguson, no run Afridi and Akmal are very confident they've git him and but the decision goes upstairs, Ferguson gets a thick inside edge onto his boot and the ball lobs to Akmal, they appeal for the catch, replays weren't exactly clear and he gets the benefit of the
Afridi to Ferguson, no run stays back and cuts to cover
Afridi to Ferguson, no run pushes it back to the bowler
Malik to Watson, 1 run stays back and cuts to the off side
Malik to Ferguson, FOUR runs bowls it quicker and the ball straightens, too short as Ferguson rocks back and slaps it in the huge gap between point and cover
Malik to Ferguson, 1 wide loses his line and strays wide down the leg side
Malik to Ferguson, no run stays back and punches it straight to mid-on
Malik to Ferguson, 1 run gets across and pushes it towards the covers
Malik to Watson, 1 run comes back in and he rocks back and cuts to short third man
Malik to Ferguson, 1 run waits for the turn and punches it towards mid-on
Afridi to Ferguson, no run lands outside off and he dabs it away late to third man
Afridi to Ferguson, no run full and driven straight back to the bowler
Afridi to Ferguson, 1 run gets away with a short ball as he pulls and finds the fielder at deep midwicket
Afridi to Watson, 1 run flighted on middle and leg and he kneels down and sweeps behind square
Afridi to Ferguson, 3 runs forces it to fine leg and the the fielder sprints across and just manages to pull it back
Afridi to Watson, 1 run drops it short and he pulls hard but mistimes it to deep square leg
Malik to Watson, no run shuffles and clips it to square leg
Malik to Watson, 1 run driven to the on side
Malik to Ferguson, no run plays top early and the ball skids through and clips his pads
Malik to Ferguson, no run waits for it to turn and defends
Malik to Ferguson, no run gets sharp turn from the rough and Ferguson defends it behind his front pad
Malik to Ferguson, 1 run walks across his stumps early and punches it with the turn to long-on
Arafat to Ferguson, FOUR runs drops it a fraction too short and he gets his bottom hand working as he pulls it and finds the boundary at deep midwicket
Arafat to Ferguson, 1 wide strays too wide down the leg side, poor delivery
Arafat to Ferguson, no run rocks back and punches it straight to cover
Arafat to Ferguson, no run stays on the backfoot, moves his foot across and whips it back to the bowler
Arafat to Ferguson, no run comes back in and he moves across and tucks it to the on side
Arafat to Ferguson, 1 run short of a length on middle and leg, he pulls it down to deep midwicket
Arafat to Watson, 1 leg bye drops it towards short leg and Ferguson was quickly off the blocks
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run That's his 100! Shuffles and nudges to square leg, it's his second in ODIs, he's played with lots of concentration against the spinners
Ajmal to Ferguson, 1 wide really wide down the leg side
Ajmal to Ferguson, 1 run full on the middle stump and he plays the reverse sweep to point
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run back of a length and tucked behind square on the on side
Ajmal to Ferguson, 1 run gets on his knee and tucks it to deep square leg, they think of a second run
Ajmal to Watson, no run
Ajmal to Watson, 2 runs clips it to the vacant spaces at deep square-leg and they put a lot of pressure on the fielder
Shoaib Akhtar to Ferguson, no run too wide outside off and he gets away with it as Ferguson reaches out and chops it down to point
Shoaib Akhtar to Ferguson, 1 run the slower ball and he shuffles across and tucks it to fine leg
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 2 runs full and straight and heaved down to long-on, a better throw from Gul would have had Watson on deep trouble
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run full on the offstump and powered down the ground to long-off
Shoaib Akhtar to Ferguson, 1 run makes room to squeeze out a yorker and the ball lobs off the pitch and drops towards short leg
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run squirts out a yorker to Younis at short cover and they complete a sharp single
Ajmal to Watson, 1 wide strays down the leg side
Ajmal to Watson, no run clipped to the on side
Ajmal to Watson, no run tries to work it away to the on side but the ball turns back in and clips his pad
Ajmal to Watson, 1 leg bye turns in and the ball rolls off his pads to the off side
Ajmal to Ferguson, no run he attempts the reverse sweep but misses

Ajmal to Ferguson, 1 run Run-out chance! Ferguson clips it towards square leg and he turns quickly for the second run, Clarke sends him back and he's halfway down the pitch, the fielder fires the throw to the bowler who gets a bad bounce and fluffs it, otherwise Ferguson was in
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run
Umar Gul to Watson, FOUR runs lovely shot! He drops it short and he halfway down on one knee and times the pull really well, the ball just drops short of the rope at deep square leg
Umar Gul to Watson, no run full outside off and squirted to mid-off
Umar Gul to Watson, no run another neat yorker and he jams it back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Watson, 2 runs whips it wide of midwicket and Shoaib runs across and cuts it off
Umar Gul to Watson, no run inswinging yorker and he squirts it to long-off on the full
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run another excellent yorker and he squeezes it out in front of mid-off and sets off
Ajmal to Watson, no run goes for a huge slog and Ajmal cleverly drops the doosra and beats him
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run punched to the right of long-on

Ajmal to Ferguson, no run he attempts a reverse sweep and nearly loses his footing as he tries to keep his backfoot rooted to the crease, Akmal whips off the bails and the third umpire takes a look, he was safe
Ajmal to Ferguson, no run chips down the track and checks his shot
Ajmal to Ferguson, 1 run drifts down the leg side and he sweeps to fine leg
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run steps down the track and he punches him down to the covers
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 wide strays too wide outside off, Watson tries in vain to get some bat on ball
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run 147 kph, searing yorker outside off and he fails to dig it out

Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 2 runs inswinging yorker on middle and leg and he forces it hard down to long-on, Misbah fires a flat throw to the bowler who whips off the bails, the third umpire takes a look, I think Ferguson is quite lucky to be there because it looked as if his bat
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 2 runs Dropped Watson bends down for a wild slog and mishits it to Gul at midwicket, he fails to get under the ball as he pedals backwards
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 2 runs he drills it to long-on and they take another chance with Misbah at long-on, the throw is wayward
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run makes room and squeezes it to the off side
Shoaib Akhtar to Ferguson, 2 runs gets forward and drives just wide of long-off, it's another wayward throw and Australia get to 250
Join us in about 30 minutes for the chase.

Australia will settle for 250 and this target will really test Pakistan's sometimes brittle batting line-up. The fielding wasn't really up to the mark. Watson played a special knock against the spinners. That'll come as good news for the Rajasthan Royals as well.
We're back for the chase. Butt and Shehzad walk out. Bollinger to start off. Some sightscreen trouble
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run has him driving away from the body straightaway, the ball goes straight through and beats the edge
Bollinger to Shehzad, 1 wide strays down the leg side and wide called, Haddin does well to cover the movement
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run half volley outside off and driven to cover point

Bollinger to Shehzad, (no ball) OUT terrible start for Pakistan! Tucks the ball to the on side and Laughlin runs across to his right, slides and takes aim at the non-striker's end while still on all fours, Butt turns around, it's a direct hit and Butt was nowhere in the scene,
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run Free Hit Swings wildly off one arm and nearly chops the stumps behind him, the ball clips his body and rolls away
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run keeps it on a length outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run gets right behind the line and pushes it to mid-on
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run drives it to mid-off
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run swings away and lands on a full length and he drives to mid-off
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run full again and he defends on the front foot
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run gets across and pushes it to the on side
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run close call for Younis as he gets a thick leading edge which drops short of short cover
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run drops it short and he stands on one leg and pulls to square leg
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run stands tall and punches it to the off side
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run good length on the offstump and he gets right behind the line and defends
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run lands it outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
Bollinger to Shehzad, 1 wide digs one in short and the ball flies over Shehzad

Bollinger to Shehzad, (no ball) that's a brute of a delivery! Shehzad tries to fend off a quick bouncer and the ball lobs off the top of the bat and Haddin takes the catch, Shehzad walks and Bowden consults with the other umpire and reverses the decision on the grounds that it
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run
Bollinger to Shehzad, 1 run full outside off and driven to third man
Bollinger to Younis, no run
Bollinger to Younis, no run
Hilfenhaus to Shehzad, no run lands outside off and he leaves it alone
Hilfenhaus to Shehzad, 1 run short and wide and he reaches out and cuts wide of backward point, third man is square
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run he drives with the swing to cover
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run prods forward, hangs his bat out and the away swing beats him
Hilfenhaus to Younis, 1 run slower ball, he gets forward and taps it to cover and takes a quick single
Hilfenhaus to Shehzad, no run drives hard down the pitch and the bowler does well to slide and cut it off
Bollinger to Younis, 1 run hangs his bat out and gets a thick inside edge onto his pads, his feet are not moving tonight
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run angles it on the body and the ball clips his body and rolls to the on side
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run gets across and taps it back to the bowler
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run drives a full delivery down the practice pitch and finds mid-off
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run this one cuts away off the pitch and nearly shaves the outside edge as he tries to punch him without moving his feet
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run angles away from the right hander and he's beaten yet again
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run gets across his stumps and defends to the on side
Hilfenhaus to Younis, 2 runs drives uppishly away from the body and beats a diving Hopes at backward point
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run hesitation! He punches one to the covers and sets off, turns around and the throw is just wide at the striker's end
Hilfenhaus to Younis, 1 run gets forward and drives inside out wide of cover
Hilfenhaus to Shehzad, no run
Hilfenhaus to Shehzad, no run lands on the offstump and he gets behind the line and defends
Bollinger to Younis, 1 run stays back and he punches it off the full face of the bat to midwicket
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run 138 kph, lands it outside off and he gets beside the line and defends
Bollinger to Shehzad, 1 run turns the bat and times it well towards mid-on and the fielder does really well to get to his right and effect a sliding save

Bollinger to Younis, no run close to a run out! Bollinger dives to his left and deflects the ball towards the stumps and had the ball hit the stumps Shehzad would have gone, it missed the stumps by a whisker
Bollinger to Younis, FOUR runs lovely shot, overpitched on middle and off and Younis drives off the full face of the bat and beats the bowler
Bollinger to Younis, 1 run gets forward and the ball edges onto his body and rolls away
Hilfenhaus to Younis, FOUR runs bangs it in short and Younis gets on top of the bounce and he pulls over midwicket, all power behind that shot
Hilfenhaus to Younis, 1 run gets beside the line and steers it wide of backward point
Hilfenhaus to Shehzad, no run stays back at the crease and punches it towards mid-on
Hilfenhaus to Shehzad, no run fractionally short and he pulls but doesn't get his placement spot on and Hopes does well to slide to his left and stop a few runs
Hilfenhaus to Shehzad, 1 run angles it down to third man, he plays it with the swing
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run full and swinging away, he pushes forward and finds mid-off
Laughlin to Shehzad, no run bang on target - on the offstump and he steers it to the off side
Laughlin to Shehzad, 2 runs stays at the crease and punches it on the up and beats the narrow gap between the covers
Laughlin to Shehzad, no run taps it to the off side, tells his captain to stay put
Laughlin to Shehzad, 2 runs gets a thick edge which just beats first slip, Hilfy does well at third man to slide and save a boundary
Laughlin to Shehzad, no run gets a thick edge onto his body which rolls to the on side
Laughlin to Shehzad, no run gets his bat right in front of the offstump and steers it to the off side
Hilfenhaus to Younis, 1 run reaches out to an away swinger and drives very uppishly past the vacant gully region
Hilfenhaus to Shehzad, 1 run swivels a little too early on the pull and he mistimes it to deep square leg
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run gives him width and he slaps it hard on the front foot and finds cover
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run drives hard on the front foot but he cannot beat mid-off
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run gets right behind the line and defends down the track
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run slaps it hard on the offside but the ball flashes to Watson at short point on the first bounce
Laughlin to Shehzad, 1 run short ball and he pulls it behind square on the on side
Laughlin to Younis, 1 run punches it in front of mid-on and puts pressure on the fielder by setting off for a single, the fielder fumbles
Laughlin to Shehzad, no run driven hard and he can't beat the infied on the off side, Australia are plugging the gaps
Laughlin to Shehzad, no run mistimes the drive on the front foot and he finds Symonds at short extra cover
Laughlin to Shehzad, 1 run punches it on the front foot just wide of mid-off and he calls for the run quickly
Laughlin to Younis, no run the slower ball and he gets well forward and defends
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run flighted outside off, he pushes it to midwicket
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run flighted on middle and off, he chips it in the air to mid-on
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run defends with a dead bat to the on side and sets off for a quick single
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run gives him a fraction of width and he chops it towards point
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 leg bye angled on the pads and he clips it towards short fine leg
Hauritz to Younis, 1 run angled it across the right hander and he nudges it to the on side
Laughlin to Younis, FOUR runs he plays an elegant backfoot punch in the gap between midwicket and square leg and Ferguson gives the chase, pulls the ball back but the ball rolls back to the ropes
Laughlin to Younis, 1 run angles it to third man
Laughlin to Shehzad, no run gets on the front foot and drives through the off side
Laughlin to Shehzad, no run loses his concentration and drives away from the body without getting to the pitch of the ball
Laughlin to Shehzad, 1 run takes the aerial route by chipping it over mid-on but he knows where the fielders are, the ball drops in front of long-on
Laughlin to Younis, 1 leg bye shuffles across and he fails to get bat on ball for a yorker, the ball clips his pads and rolls away, the bowler appeals but the ball was missing leg
Hauritz to Younis, 2 runs clips it with the turn to deep midwicket

Hauritz to Younis, OUT he takes a couple of paces down the pitch and tries to go downtown with the turn, he doesn't go through with the shot and hence fails to get the elevation, Hilfenhaus runs to his right and takes the catch at wide long-on
Hauritz to Kamran, no run gets right behind the line and defends
Hauritz to Kamran, no run gets across his stumps, waits for the turn and defends soflty
Hauritz to Kamran, no run nearly gives a bat-pad catch to Ferguson at forward short-leg
Hauritz to Kamran, no run close! He defends with soft hands and the ball nearly rolls to the stumps
Bollinger to Shehzad, 1 wide starts off his new spell with a wide down the leg side
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run full on the legstump and tapped to the on side
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run gets across and taps it very softly to midwicket
Bollinger to Shehzad, FOUR runs overpitched outside off and Shehzad gets on his knee and plays an elegant square drive past the gap between cover and point
Bollinger to Shehzad, 1 run defends on the backfoot towards cover and he sets off
Bollinger to Kamran, 1 run stays on the backfoot and steers it towards gully
Bollinger to Shehzad, no run angles away from the right hander and the ball beats the outside edge
Hauritz to Kamran, no run lunges forward and there's turn and bounce, no bat involved luckily
Hauritz to Kamran, no run lobs off the pads and drops just wide of forward short-leg
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run gets to the pitch and drives just wide if mid-off and sets off
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run clips it with the turn wide of midwicket
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run nudges it to fine leg and Bolinger fires a powerful throw while still on his knees

Hauritz to Shehzad, OUT Hauritz really deserved it! The ball turns very sharply off the rough and Shehzad shapes to cut but the turn foxes him, the ball clips the top flap of his pad bang in front of the stumps, Aleem Dar is convinced, easy decision
Bollinger to Kamran, 2 runs angles it on the pads and he clips it to deep square leg

Bollinger to Kamran, FOUR runs shot of the evening, Kamran shows the full face of the bat and pushes a half volley right back past the bowler, the ball disappears quickly and Kamran is so proud of that shot that he walks down the pitch and continues to show the full face of the
Bollinger to Kamran, no run
Bollinger to Kamran, no run the ball darts away sharply off the pitch and foxes everybody, Haddin does well to fall to his right and save it
Bollinger to Kamran, no run shows the full face of the bat and defends
Bollinger to Kamran, 1 run opens the face of the bat and steers it wide of second slip

Hauritz to Kamran, no run sweeps but gets an under edge
Hauritz to Kamran, no run gets right across his stumps and defends
Hauritz to Kamran, no run rocks back and chops it down to point
Hauritz to Kamran, 2 runs gets on his knee and sweeps to fine leg

Clarke to Misbah, 1 run gets beside the line and steers it towards point
Clarke to Kamran, 1 run rocks back and cuts to point
Clarke to Misbah, 1 run
Clarke to Kamran, 1 run full outside off and he drives to point
Clarke to Misbah, FOUR runs he slashes late and gets a thick edge which just beats first slip, Hilfenhaus chases like his life depends on it and almost pulls it back at third man
Hauritz to Kamran, 3 runs nudges it with the turn to fine leg and the fielder mops up
Hauritz to Misbah, no run strikes him outside the line of the offstump and Ferguson dives to his left and tries to take it on the full, no bat involved
Hauritz to Misbah, 2 runs gets on his knee and sweeps to deep square-leg
Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run
Hauritz to Kamran, FOUR runs opens the face of the bat and delicately steers it past slip, he places it wide if short third man, intelligent cricket by Akmal
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run paddles it around the corner

Hauritz to Kamran, 2 runs deliberately cuts it late past slip, he's toying with the bowler here
Hauritz to Kamran, 4 byes lucky! He drives hard on the front foot and misses it completely, the to spinner beats the batsman, keeper and slip
Hauritz to Kamran, no run stays back and chops it hard to point

Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run taps it to the off side and Akmal set off like a cheetah at the other end
Laughlin to Misbah, FOUR runs starts off poorly by overpitching on the pads and he glances it on its way and exploits the big gap at fine leg, that's the 50 stand as well
Laughlin to Misbah, 1 run on the pads and he clips it to the on side
Laughlin to Kamran, FOUR runs short and wide outside off and he cheekily upper cuts him past the vacant slip region, clever shot
Laughlin to Kamran, 1 run pushed just wide of cover point for a single
Laughlin to Misbah, no run gets right behind the line and defends
Laughlin to Misbah, no run same result, he gets across and keeps it away, may have been the slower ball

Hauritz to Kamran, no run tossed up outside off, he gets well forward and defends
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run shuffles and works it wide of midwicket and sets off

Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run gets across the stumps and works it with the turn to the on side
Laughlin to Misbah, 1 run gets some reverse swing, he meets the ball on the full and works it with the line to long-on

Hopes to Kamran, 1 run cuts wide of backward point and that's his fifty! Very intelligent innings indeed
Hopes to Misbah, 2 runs full outside off and driven just wide of short cover

Hopes to Kamran, 1 run gets beside the line and squirts it to the off side

Hopes to Misbah, no run wide outside off and he has a waft at it, rare lapse in concentration
Hopes to Misbah, 1 run lands outside off, he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third nan

Hopes to Kamran, 1 run shuffles and nudges it to the on side

Symonds to Kamran, no run cuts hard but finds short third man

Symonds to Kamran, FOUR runs he's unstoppable! Short and wide outside off, he rocks back and slaps it hard past backward point, perfect placement
Symonds to Kamran, no run defends to the on side
Symonds to Kamran, 2 runs he gets width and slaps it towards deep cover, easy two there, 10 off the over
Hopes to Misbah, no run defends close to the pads after walking across his stumps

Hopes to Misbah, no run excellent delivery, kicks up and beats Misbah's hopeful prod

Hopes to Misbah, 2 runs action, panic, everything! Misbah drops it in front of mid-off and takes a risky single, the throw is wide of the keeper and they take the overthrow, Haddin back flicks the ball on the stumps but Misbah times his dive well

Hilfenhaus to Kamran, FOUR runs fractionally short and he plays a short arm pull over midwicket, Laughlin makes a brave attempt to slide and cut it off and he nearly cleans up the ball boys at the rope

Hopes to Kamran, no run gets on the front foot and drives down the pitch
Hopes to Kamran, no run tries to work it across the line and the ball hits his pad just outside the line of leg, stifled appeal by Hopes
Hopes to Kamran, 1 run short and wide and he plays an uppish slash past gully and the ball runs to third man

Clarke to Kamran, no run waits for it to turn before nudging it to third man

Clarke to Kamran, no run nudges it to the on side

Clarke to Kamran, 1 run sweeps and places it to short fine leg
Clarke to Misbah, 1 run kneels down early and sweeps to fine leg
Clarke to Kamran, 1 run he sweeps it to fine leg and brings up his fifth ODI hundred! Akmal gets on his knee and does the sajda, Younis is on his feet
Clarke to Misbah, no run rocks back and cuts it to point
Clarke to Misbah, 1 run gets forward and pushes it to long-on
Clarke to Kamran, FOUR runs tosses it on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and slog sweeps him just over the reach of deep square leg who leaps up, a few inches more and it would have been a six
Laughlin to Misbah, no run full and swinging inwards, he pushes it to mid-on
Laughlin to Misbah, 1 run swings on the pads and he clips it with ease down to deep midwicket
Laughlin to Kamran, FOUR runs he makes room to a slower ball and scoops him over extra cover

Laughlin to Kamran, FOUR runs this time ha backs away and goes squarer, he scoops it over backward point this time, it's the highest score by a wicketkeeper against Australia after Ken Wadsworth and Sangakkara
Laughlin to Kamran, no run he has a huge swing and a miss, he wants to finish this off now
Laughlin to Kamran, 1 wide slides wide down the leg side, wide called
Laughlin to Kamran, FOUR runs this time he stays at the crease, comes to the pitch of the ball and drives elegantly through the covers
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, FOUR runs drops it fractionally short and Misbah gets into position early for the pull rolls his wrists and thumps him past the fielder who sprints from deep square leg
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, FOUR runs yet another half tracker, he swivels and thumps it high over midwicket, nobody patrolling the area to stop that
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run he pushes it hard to mid-off and yells at his partner to stay back
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run he bangs in the bouncer and Misbah fails to make contact on the hook
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, FOUR runs Game over! Misbah gets forward to a pitched up delivery and chips him high over mid-on's reach
Thanks for your company. Do join us for the one-off Twenty20 on May 7 in Dubai. This is Kanishkaa signing off. Cheers!
The PCB has given a special award of Rs 500,000 for Kamran Akmal. Very generous gesture. This shows how much this win means for them.
Clarke is the Man of the Series.
There are a million prizes to be won. This will take all night.
We'll cut to the presentation.
